attributes.action: Get rid of the NHS National IT Systems and Spend on Patient CARE
attributes.additional_details:
An IT System never made anyone better

The present Government campaigned against the billions of pounds wasted when Labour introduced 3 National IT Systems

These are funded before the Hospitals get their money to treat you

NOW THEY ARE In Power
Cutting NHS staff
Waiting Time increases
Hospitals and Wards closing

BUT STILL FUNDING NATIONAL SYSTEMS AND WASTING MONEY AND STILL NOT DELIVERING
